text:
Hi, everybody! I just finished my practicum and I’m about submit the link to the template like so
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/design-manager/MYHUBID>```
Is this okay? I’ve been working so hard these past few days on it, I don’t want to screw it up at the very end :sweat_smile:

Haha. Nice! Yeah that link will be perfect. You can also just grab the URL in the browser when you're previewing or just editing the template. Pretty much anything will work. As long as I have the account ID where the work lives I can find it.
